text: Justin Renfrow (born November 23, 1989) is a Canadian football offensive tackle for the Edmonton Eskimos of the Canadian Football League (CFL). He has previously played for the Florida Blacktips and Hudson Valley Fort of the Fall Experimental Football League (FXFL). ==High school== Renfrow played defensive end and Tight End at William Penn Charter School. ==College== Renfrow played defensive end for Virginia before switching to play at Miami (FL). ==Professional career== ===Arizona Cardinals=== Renfrow went undrafted in 2014. He and 11 other Cardinals players were released on August 25, 2014. ===Green Bay Packers=== Renfrow signed a contract with the Green Bay Packers but was released on December 29, 2014. ===Seattle Seahawks=== Renfrow switched positions to offensive tackle. He signed a contract with the Seattle Seahawks. He signed a future contract along with 10 other teammates, but was released after. ===San Francisco 49ers=== Renfrow signed a contract with San Francisco 49ers on May 18, 2015 along with Michigan State's Mylan Hicks. He was released on September 5, 2015 in order for the 49ers to make their 53-man roster. ===Buffalo Bills=== On June 17, 2016, Renfrow signed with the Buffalo Bills. ===Calgary Stampeders=== Renfrow signed with the Calgary Stampeders on May 19, 2017 and dressed in six games during the 2017 CFL season. He played in only one game in 2018, but was a member of the 106th Grey Cup championship team that year. He spent the first seven weeks of the 2019 CFL season on the practice roster. ===BC Lions=== On July 28, 2019, Renfrow was traded to the BC Lions. ==References== ==External links== *Miami bio Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:American football offensive tackles Category:Canadian football offensive linemen Category:American players of Canadian football Category:Miami Hurricanes football players Category:Arizona Cardinals players Category:Seattle Seahawks players Category:San Francisco 49ers players Category:Virginia Cavaliers football players Category:Blacktips (FXFL) players Category:Hudson Valley Fort players Category:Buffalo Bills players Category:Players of American football from Pennsylvania Category:Sportspeople from Philadelphia Category:Green Bay Packers players Category:Calgary Stampeders players Category:Grey Cup champions Category:BC Lions players
title: Justin Renfrow
